body_html:
• The Windows tests have passed.
  • The non-ok status is handled as 1) for all the error statuses except NOT_FOUND, return them to the caller immediately; 2) for NOT_FOUND error, skip them to continue searching and only return them to the caller when all the patterns/the last pattern refers to a non-exist path.

@jsimsa Could you help review these changes when you have time?
